level.heading: EXCEPTIONS TO THE SCHEDULE OF REQUIREMENTS[COLON] CENTRAL EMPLOYMENT AREA (ยง1-2105)

level.text: The number of parking spaces required under ยง 2101.1 for a nonresidential building or structure located within the Central Employment Area may be reduced or eliminated; provided:
The building or structure has a direct connection to a Metrorail station currently in operation or for which a construction contract has been awarded; and

For a Disposition Lot, as depicted on Map No. 5 of the Urban Renewal Plan for the Downtown Urban Renewal Area, as modified by the National Capital Planning Commission and approved by the Council of the District of Columbia through July 5, 1983, parking may not be reduced below the limit specified in that Plan.
